import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve Reward Distribution of a Round"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/summary/rewards"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the reward distribution for a specific staking round, including overall rewards distributed, burnt rewards, commission fees, and staking sharing.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"round","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The round number for which reward distribution is being requested.","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Reward distribution for the round retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code indicating the result of the operation."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Additional information or message about the response."},"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"round":{"type":"integer","description":"The round number for which the reward distribution is reported."},"overallRewardsDistributed":{"type":"integer","description":"The total rewards distributed in the given round."},"rewardsBurnt":{"type":"integer","description":"The amount of rewards burnt in the given round."},"rewardsCommissionFees":{"type":"integer","description":"The amount of rewards used for commission fees in the given round."},"rewardsStakingSharing":{"type":"integer","description":"The amount of rewards distributed for staking sharing in the given round."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"An error occurred while retrieving the reward distribution.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code of the error response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
